name: id
type: Type: String (cast from an integer but not guaranteed to be a number)
description: Description: The ID of the attachment in the database.

name: type
description: Description: The type of the attachment.

name: url
description: Description: The location of the original full-size attachment.

name: preview_url
description: Description: The location of a scaled-down preview of the attachment.

name: remote_url
type: Type: NULLABLE String (URL), or null if the attachment is local
description: Description: The location of the full-size original attachment on the remote website.
